item.title: LA fires live updates: 1,400 firefighters battling 'unprecedented' fires, Newsom says
item.description: Tens of thousands of people are under evacuation order as the Palisades Fire, Eaton Fire and Hurst Fire spread.

item.title: WATCH: ABC TV reporter battles ‘vicious’ winds amid LA fires
item.description: Leanne Suter, of ABC News' Los Angeles station KABC, reports from the Eaton Fire in Southern California.

item.title: WATCH: California fires seen from plane window before LAX landing
item.description: California fires seen from a diverted plane, with flames completely engulfing the area below.

item.title: Trump threatens land grabs of Panama Canal, Greenland, by force. Can he?: ANALYSIS
item.description: The president-elect claims it’s vital for national and economic security.

item.title: WATCH: Belle the service dog meets Disney Princess Belle in a 'tail' as old as time
item.description: They really are "Beauty and the Beast."
